item.title: Chapter 0
item.description: Find all functions $x(t),~y(t)$ satisfying $$x’(t) = y(t) - x(t)$$ $$y’(t) = 3x(t) - 3y(t) $$. Find the Particular pair of functions satisfying $x(0)=y(0)=1/2$ Solution : We solve this by eliminating variables. Find the function $f(n), n = 0,1,…,10$ that satisfies \begin{equation*} f(n) = \frac{1}{4}f(n-1)+\frac{3}{4}f(n+1), n=1,2,..,9, \end{equation*} and $f(0)=0,~f(1)=1$. Solution : The Fibonacci numbers $F_n$ are defined by $F_1=1,~F_2=1$ and for $n>2$, $F_n=F_{n-1}+F_{n-2}$. Find a formula for $F_n$ by solving the difference equation.

item.title: Poisson tiles: part 1
item.description: Summary The motivation for this mini-project was to not only get more familiar with working with $\tt{pygame}$ but also to give myself a playground that I could hook into other packages like $\tt{networkx}$. I also wanted to practice generating fractals. While looking over old notes, I came across the rules for a random process that looked interesting to visualize and potential to become fractal-like. Introduction Simeon Denis Poisson lived between 1781-1840 during the tail end of the Age of Enlightenment, a time period characterized by a shift towards the pursuit for knowledge.
